name: beta-v90
body:
(Use fix available below)
v90-beta 0.8.7 (testing beta)
 - Updated to Api-v7 (With on device caching support).
 - Lifecycle aware Ads (Non intrusive)
 - Migrated to Room Database
 - Improved adapter filtering
 - Improved UI
 - Updated dependencies
 - Updated README

name: beta-v80
body:
Changes since v70
- Migrated to Api-v6
 - Migrated to Kotlin
 - Refreshed UI
 - Replaced AsyncTask with Kotlin's Coroutines
 - Migrated to JDK 8 code base
 - Added Deep Link Handler
 - Improved Performance
 - Various Fixes

name: release-v70-rc4
body:
Changes from v70-rc1 to v70-rc4
 * Updated App Design [Not Conflicts with Android Q Gestures]
 * Updated Gradle Dependencies
 * Fixed Naming issues in Random Fragment
 * Fixed shows listing issues
 * Updated Application Version
 * Removed Unused Resources

name: release-v70-rc1
body:
Changes from v65-7 to v70
 - Updated App Design
 - Updated app to Newer API Supporting Network Cache
 - Favourites Delete From Activity
 - New Data for Views & Favourites [Beta]
 - Fixed some color issues in light theme
 - Updated Network Model API

Changes from v70 to v70-rc1
 - Fixed issues in Dark Theme
 - Fixed issue while adding a show to favourite
 - Fixed various UI Elements
 - Fixed Application Version
 - Removed unused dependencies
 - Updated README

Report bugs using GitHub Issues Section...

name: release-v65
body:
Release Version - 0.6.5
 - New Simplified UI
 - Improved Dark Theme Support
 - ViewModel Implementation with Data Offline Support
 - Removed In-App Update Check [Needs Rework]
 - Improved API Support [api-v6]
 - Improved Notification Support
 - Version Bump to 6.5
 - Various Bug Fixes & Performance Improvements
 - Added Support to Nyaa API [Pending Implementation]
